title: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type. The icon has also changed from the parent java file icon to a generic file icon.
OB:
When performing the following steps:
1) Open an existing java file
2) Modify the java file (such as moving an existing class)
3) Click the SaveAs icon, located next to the Save Icon
A dialog will appear.
4) Browse for a valid container location
5) Type the filename without specifying the file extension (as it is not requested)
6) Click OK.

Observed Behavior:
The Navigator has added the file in the specified location, but the file extension is not shown.
EB: The expected behavior is that after performing the SaveAs operation without specifying the file extension, the Navigator should still display the file with the correct file extension.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1) Open an existing java file
2) Modify the java file (such as moving an existing class)
3) Click the SaveAs icon, located next to the Save Icon
A dialog will appear.
4) Browse for a valid container location
5) Type the filename without specifying the file extension (as it is not requested)
6) Click OK.

Expected Result:
The Navigator should add the file in the specified location and display the file with the correct file extension.
